feed.title: Combined summary - Minor editorial fixes to lightning-rfc

entry.title: Combined summary - Minor editorial fixes to lightning-rfc
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj sent minor editorial patches to the lighting-rfc via email. Rusty advised ZmnSCPxj to use GitHub pull requests for minor fixes. Rusty provided a link to the GitHub pull request page and mentioned that large change proposals are best discussed on the mailing list but should still start with a GitHub patch. In response, ZmnSCPxj acknowledged Rusty's suggestion. The attached patches included corrections to typos and text placement within the document.
